about_the_game:
◆Remember to Add Wish Lists


◆Characters

Why does my childhood sweetheart wear a maid outfit? Is that a challenge?

Coach, why does yoga strengthen body?

Teacher, how exactly should adults learn English?

If all of this leaves you unsatisfied, then there's...
How to petting the cat girl?

Why does the workplace junior insist on wroking at my apartment?
Oh my gosh, they are so sweet! What should I choose?
Children make choice, and I want...
Don't be greedy

◆Story

You will play the role of 'Wu Ming', an aspiring young man who fights alone, just as normal as you and me.
Living in this busy and noisy world, with heavy works, boring life, lonely nights, restless souls... Life is so hard already, how about a sweet relationship?
From a first-person perspective, you'll start an interactive relationship with these sweet and beautiful ladies in a variety of realistic scenarios, and finally choose your Happy Ending!
We hope this immersive love light comedy satisfies you emotionally and offers you a break for your heart

◆Game Features

- First-person perspective view, immersive experience
Live action and live interpretation, enjoy those scenes of being in love at a close distance

- Diverse options
Free choice of your own relationship genre - gentle, tough, flattering, funny
Setting aside a standard answer, do not worry about picking the wrong one, just follow your heart!

- Multiple branches and endings
Depending on your choices, the story will come to an end, all choices are yours!
Rich story line, chapter mode, solo mode, and achievement system all cater to your desire for exploration

- Enjoy your relationship without efforts and bothersome
NO indifference, NO unrequited love, NO slow starter, NO loss
Super active, Super interactive, Super passionate, Super satisfying.

- Rich bonus, Rich highlights
A selection of exciting moments and highlights is stored in an album waiting to be unlocked for you to review in your spare time

◆Game Functions

  • With visual novel elements, interactive selection function.
  • Full motion video from a first-person perspective
  • Game duration 4 hours +
  • Clear Process Tree
  • Loading function
  • Achievement system
  • Gallery function
  • Multi-language

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win10/Win11
  • Processor: Dual-core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win10/Win11
  • Processor: Dual-core processors and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: In this First-Person Full Motion Video Game, you will meet all kinds of charming ladies. From childhood sweethearts to obeyed workplace junior, elegant teacher, cat girl cosplayer, and hot yoga instructor. You will experience an unimaginable love journey and reach the happy ending with them.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
